SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am24.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am24.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameControllerInterface, Serializable, Runnable, Remote
public class GameController extends Object implements GameControllerInterface, Serializable, Runnable
The GameController class manages the game state, player actions, and game flow. It implements the GameControllerInterface and Serializable and also runs a thread to handle game operations.
See Also:

      listener - the GameListener for the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a network error.
      FullLobbyException - if the lobby is full.

      Parameters:

    • heartbeat

      public void heartbeat(String nickname, GameListener listener) throws RemoteException
      Handles the heartbeat signal from a player to indicate their active presence.
      Specified by:
      heartbeat in interface GameControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player sending the heartbeat.
      listener - The GameListener associated with the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a network error during communication with the listener.

    • disconnectPlayer

      public void disconnectPlayer(String nickname) throws RemoteException, NotExistingPlayerException
      Disconnects a player from the game. Removes the player from the player list, rotation, and listeners. Checks if there is only one player left in the game and notifies the listener about the game end.
      Specified by:
      disconnectPlayer in interface GameControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player to disconnect.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a network error during communication with the listener.
      NotExistingPlayerException - if the player does not exist.
